HotelElement.Name: Clarion Congress Hotel Usti nad Labem

Description.Text: Clarion Congress Hotel Usti nad Labem is a modern 4-star property promising cheerful accommodation and great service, near the heart of the city. Highlights include a gastronomic restaurant and free Wi-Fi. Located roughly 1km from the centre of Ostrava, and only 700m from the nearest train station, the hotel is a fantastic base from which to explore the surrounding area. Attractions in the city and beyond include Strekov castle, Ceske Svycarsko national park and the Bohemian Highlands. The hotel occupies a mid-rise neo-cubist property with a pinkish facade. There are no onsite leisure facilities, but free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. The hotel is bike-friendly, providing secure locking stations, maps and equipment for basic repairs. The Benada restaurant offers traditional Czech gastronomy with a contemporary twist in a comfortable setting. The bar serves a range of hot and cold beverages. Standard rooms are spacious and tastefully designed, featuring a bright modern decor, large windows and light wood furniture. Amenities include a safe, mini-bar and en-suite bathroom with bathtub. Chargeable parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
